original_title: Burn (Or, the Second Law of Thermodynamics)
overview: Originally super-8mm in a 16mm projector, found footage hand manipulated in the gate, the work derived from 'intentional accidents' developed from a Robert Beck Memorial Cinema program called "Mistakes (everything you can do wrong)." It uses a short strip of super-8 footage of 1970s bondage porn pulled through the projector gate and burned frame-by-frame, in a live performance.
title: Burn (Or, the Second Law of Thermodynamics)
